overview: He is very caring and loving Guy (Patrick). But on the contrary, his fianc√©e (Bridget) is not. She is a cheat and unfaithful. Bridget sneaks out for Parties, Clubbing without the knowledge of Patrick. All the arrangements for the wedding ceremony are in the process but, Bridget's heart seems to be far away. Doreen has all the information about Bridget and her cheat but Patrick disbelieves them when reported. Watch this movie and see how the truth came to bear.
title: Just the Last Fun
